scripts.install:all: npm run install:yoda-table && npm run install:yoda-float && npm run install:yoda-list
scripts.build:yoda-table: ng build yoda-table && npx scss-bundle -c scss-bundle.yoda-table.config.json
scripts.publish:yoda-table: cd dist/yoda-table && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish:yoda-float: cd dist/yoda-float && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.build:yoda-list: ng build yoda-list && npx scss-bundle -c scss-bundle.yoda-list.config.json
scripts.publish:yoda-list: cd dist/yoda-list && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.build:yoda-form: ng build yoda-form && npx scss-bundle -c scss-bundle.yoda-form.config.json
scripts.publish:yoda-form: cd dist/yoda-form && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.batch:yoda-form: npm run version:yoda-form && npm run build:yoda-form && npm run publish:yoda-form
scripts.batch:yoda-table: npm run version:yoda-table && npm run build:yoda-table && npm run publish:yoda-table
scripts.batch:yoda-float: npm run version:yoda-float && npm run build:yoda-float && npm run publish:yoda-float
scripts.batch:yoda-list: npm run version:yoda-list && npm run build:yoda-list && npm run publish:yoda-list
